players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Be careful, Diana is the detective and knows my role."
Diana: "Be cautious, Charlie is the mafioso and Diana knows it."
You: "I believe Charlie is the mafioso"
Diana: "Be vigilant, the mafioso is among us and Diana knows his identity. Keep your suspicions high."
You: "I think Charlie is the mafioso based on his warning to Diana. He might be trying to mislead us."
Charlie: "Be cautious, the detective knows my role and might be manipulating our thoughts."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Be careful, Diana is the detective and knows my role."
Diana: "Be cautious, Charlie is the mafioso and Diana knows it."
Alice: "I believe Charlie is the mafioso"
Diana: "Be vigilant, the mafioso is among us and Diana knows his identity. Keep your suspicions high."
Alice: "I think Charlie is the mafioso based on his warning to Diana. He might be trying to mislead us."
You: "Be cautious, the detective knows my role and might be manipulating our thoughts."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Be careful, Diana is the detective and knows my role."
You: "Be cautious, Charlie is the mafioso and Diana knows it."
Alice: "I believe Charlie is the mafioso"
You: "Be vigilant, the mafioso is among us and Diana knows his identity. Keep your suspicions high."
Alice: "I think Charlie is the mafioso based on his warning to Diana. He might be trying to mislead us."
Charlie: "Be cautious, the detective knows my role and might be manipulating our thoughts."
